name: Shape Escape (Weaver)
description:
Jam game for LD35 made in 72 hours.

#55/1594Fun(Jam)3.97#76/1594Overall(Jam)3.97


Shape Escape

Help your primitive friends escape through various high risk puzzles and skill intensive challenges.

We regrettably didn't have time to source music, so start up your music player and play something upbeat!

We also didn't have time to finish the third level.

_______________

BUG:
Some people have experienced spawning multiple shapes inside each other on level one, but I haven't been able to replicate it. Hit escape and go back to main menu if this happens -- shouldn't happen when you try again.
